column4: <- frustrated woman. my sound just quit on ubuntu 10.04 - does downloading teamviewer have anything to do with sound?
sound settings seem the same in System Preferences Sound
Open a terminal and... pulseaudio --kill && pulseaudio -d
pulseaudio is right but : ~$ pulseaudio --kill && pulseaudio -d
Speaking of, please use a pastebin service like http://pzt.me to post your command output.
Okay, it's running so... I dunno. If it still doesn't work, try starting alsamixer and make sure stuff isn't muted
Hey, it's no problem, always glad to help
Youtube... might as well be a flash issue
Or the Cmd key on Macs
Remap some key to it, then, like this... xmodmap -e 'keysym Ctrl_R=Super_L' will make Right Ctrl behave like Left Super
